changelog: Small release for logic tweaks and 40 Below Fridge boxes
Tweaks to logic were added. Not much else.
Added 'out of logic' logic (Yellow boxes in poptracker). These indicate items that you can grab, but that the APWorld does not expect you to grab.
Keyzer and bosses check off after release, namely for treasure hunt.
Diamond Shuffle And Room Tracking Update
Added Diamond Shuffle option, added diamond locations.
Added WL4 rooms, and locations to each. Your Poptracker should toggle pages automatically based on which room you are in. Toggle 'Auto-Tab' to disable this functionality.
Minor and major fixes to tracking and related. Some items and locations renamed.
Fixed Keyzer doors option not affecting poptracker logic when not connected to an AP session.
THE Event Tracking Update
Added code to pull the events bitfield.
Tracker now automatically tracks when bosses are defeated.
New option: Open Doors
Keyzer locations have been added, and are tracked now automatically.
'Open Doors: Closed' and 'Open Doors: Closed Diva' now takes into account what levels you have unlocked.
'Open Doors: Open' updates locations after the game connects for the first time.
Poptracker pack now also has a versions list, so this and future releases can be updated directly from Poptracker.
Wario Land 4 AP 3.0.0 Support
Fixed Location Mapping with the item ID update brought in with apworld release 3.0.0
Wario Land 4 AP 2.0.0 Support (Golden Treasure Hunt)
Fixed Location Mapping with the addition of Golden Treasure Hunt, Added Locations for Golden Treasure hunt
Added Items for Golden Treasure Hunt, Full Changelog: v0.4-H1...v0.5
Hotfix for APWorld 0.4.5
Fixed location_mapping.lua to match the removal of Spoiled Rotten in APWorld's locations.py.
Options, Fixes, and More!
Added 'Open Portal' option toggle
Added 'Advanced Logic' option toggle
Altered jewel piece names to match AP
fixed whitespace
Altered logic to match current AP
Fixed Golden passage and golden diva appearing as beatable before other bosses are available
Added auto tracking of options via slot_data
Split Gems Release
Many big changes have been made to this release!
The gem tracker now will keep checks over gem quadrants, rather than all gem pieces in hallways.
Locations should be fixed on all difficulties, tracking for chests collected should be working properly now.
A new Manual option to track how many gems you need in each passage.
Small other fixes too!
WL4_JTH Tracker Version 0.2
Initial release
